# XCLV

> XCLV is an investment company founded by Viktor Konovalov that invests in visionary geniuses when nobody else will. Based in Warsaw, Poland.

## About XCLV

XCLV is an investment company founded by Viktor Konovalov. The company's mission is investing in visionary geniuses â€” when nobody else will. XCLV identifies and backs extraordinary founders and builders at the earliest stages, before consensus forms around their potential.

The company focuses on high-conviction investments in individuals with outsized vision and the determination to reshape industries. XCLV operates with the belief that the most transformative opportunities are found where others see only risk.

## Founder

Viktor Konovalov is the founder and CEO of XCLV. He is an AI Branding Expert & Creative Director with over 25 years of international experience. In 2024, he completed the Stanford University & DeepLearning.AI Machine Learning Specialization, earning certifications in Advanced Learning Algorithms, Supervised Machine Learning, and Unsupervised Learning, Recommenders & Reinforcement Learning. He also builds pokpok.ai. He can be reached at ceo@xclv.com.
